title: The Battles Brewing at the G-20
description:
The world's most powerful leaders are gathering in Argentina for the annual G-20 summit. The to-do list for Trump, Putin, Merkel, Xi and others is a long. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg's Josh Wingrove in Buenos Aires on how the the chances of them agreeing on anything are slim.  
FOLLOW UP
 Josh's latest report: Trump's New Nafta Deal Set for Signing as Tariff Fight Remains
You can follow Josh at: @josh_wingrove 
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
